name: Ring of Shifting Sands
data: It increases the users strength slightly.
It increases the users dexterity slightly.
It increases the users constitution slightly.
It has adequate armour class for its type (pathetic in general).
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration somewhat.
It increases the users poison resistance somewhat.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It increases the users asphyxiation resistance somewhat.
